column4: Hey. I tried those project apps with varying levels of success. What many of them lack is the recurring task feature. Gantt Project is the best looking one and was really easy to install
I guessed as much :( I really don't want to go back to MS Project. I used it for a group project last year and it almost drove me insane!
Thanks. I was looking for a gui  interface because I'll need to submit evidence of work to my supervisor.
yeah. Something to consider. Might be fun to contribute to something like that.
